title: Ray Mears Demonstrations
description:
Most Videos in this torrent are fragments of TV Shows hosted by Ray Mears, and are concerning bushcraft skills demonstration. They are to serve learning, inspiration and quick access purposes. I recommend you to watch them all because they are god damn awesome.

While selecting material I have focused on things easy to learn for people living in western civilization, most of those skills are not easy at all. In fact Mears make them look easy because of his vast experience. Search more information and tutorials if you fail to replicate video's results. 

Always think when the knife will go if it miss it's work.

ALWAYS BE ABSOLUTELY SURE WHAT PLANT YOU ARE GATHERING AS SOME OF THEM MIGHT BE POISONOUS.
